column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////So I usually LOVE jinya and with the weather being so rainy lately; my fianc√© and I decided to get a to go order. The ramen was mediocre at best. I ordered my favorite tonkotsu spicy and he got it mild. We were both upset to see that the egg was cooked through
column2: the noodles were hard and stuck together and was just a kiss tonight. Definitely won't be ordering takeout from them anymore as it was a huge waste of money.
